title: Rant: I got cheated by Flipkart.
comments: Not a day goes by when I don't read a post about somebody getting scammed by Flipkart. Surprised why people still use that site.
Just replace one or two times then you'll get a return option I returned a set of books the same way to Flipkart

light_cleaned_title: Rant: I got cheated by Flipkart.
light_cleaned_selftext: I bought Elon Musk's biography from Flipkart and the seller sent me a counterfeit copy. Flipkart doesn't have a refund option only a replacement. WTF! ​ ​ [I bought Elon Musk's biography from Flipkart, and the seller sent me a counterfeit copy. Flipkart doesn't have a refund option, only a replacement. WTF!!](https://preview.redd.it/jqr76kltrlvb1.jpg?width=3024&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=5b2ceb79d9175821a4ed44c68e4e09aba13ef521)
